remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件發生時複製作業已完成將選取的內容轉換為所有指定的資料格式、 已儲存在相關聯的資料物件中的所有資料格式和準備資料物件放入系統剪貼簿，或開始拖放到作業。The event occurs when a copy operation has finished converting the selected content into all specified data formats, has stored all data formats in the associated data object, and is ready to put the data object on the system Clipboard or to begin a drag operation. 若要檢查或修改資料物件，複製作業完成之後，並繼續進行後續的作業之前，使用此事件。Use this event to inspect or modify a data object after a copy operation completes, and before proceeding with subsequent operations. 在整個複製作業可以取消藉由呼叫。The entire copy operation can be canceled by calling .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個事件來檢查資料物件，在貼上資料之前，並可能替代的動作，例如決定：Use this event to inspect a data object before the data is pasted, and possibly to decide on an alternate course of action, such as: - **取消貼上**-取消整個貼上作業，藉由呼叫方法。**Cancel the Paste** - Cancel the entire paste operation by calling the method. - **選取替代格式**-指定的新值來變更選取貼上格式屬性。**Select an Alternate Format** - Change the selected paste format by specifying a new value for the property. 選取新的格式必須支援要貼上的資料物件。The newly selected format must by supported by the data object to be pasted. > [!NOTE] > 如果貼上格式已變更，請貼上目標支援新指定的格式。If the paste format is changed, ensure that the paste target supports the newly specified format. - **插入新的格式**-如果您判斷，貼上資料物件中不支援所需的格式，更新以包含資料的版本中所需的格式資料物件。**Insert a New Format** - If you determine that the paste data object does not support the desired format, update the data object to include a version of the data in the desired format. 自訂資料轉換器常用此程序的一部分。Custom data converters are often used as part of this process. 變更貼上資料物件的內容 () 不會變更資料儲存在系統剪貼簿，則任何這類變更只會套用至相關聯的貼上 命令相關聯的資料物件。Changing the content of a paste data object () does not change the data stored on the system Clipboard; any such changes will apply only to the data object associated with the associated paste command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 複製或拖曳命令，針對每個要加入相關聯的資料物件的資料格式執行一次就會發生事件。The event occurs as part of a copy or drag command, once for each of the data formats to add to the associated data object. 通常，此事件會連線至內容控制項，例如。Typically, this event is connected to a content control, such as . 這個事件處理常式可以用來選擇性地防止不必要的資料格式加入至資料物件，因此消除重複的資料格式的資料轉換處理並改善整體效能的複製作業。A handler for this event can be used to selectively prevent unwanted data formats from being added to the data object, thus eliminating data conversion processing for redundant data formats and improving the overall performance of a copy operation. 若要跳過特定的資料格式，請呼叫方法並指定要在中略過的格式屬性。To skip a particular data format, call the method and specify the format to skip in the property. 呼叫這個事件的方法不會取消相關聯的複製或拖曳命令。Calling the method for this event does not cancel the associated copy or drag command.
